Bash(venv/Scripts/python.exe -c "
import sys
sys.path.append(''.'')
from src.agents.csv_agent import CSVAgent
import os
os.environ[''CSV_DIRECTORY''] = ''data/csv''
try:
    agent = CSVAgent()
    print(''CSV Agent initialized successfully!'')
    print(agent.get_data_info())
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Error: {e}'')
    import traceback
    traceback.print_exc()")
